title: Red Light. Green Light. | Acts 16.6–15 | Learning to Move with the Spirit
excerpt: We all know the frustration of being stopped when we were ready to move. Learning to move with the Spirit in seasons of waiting.

title: Mixed Mixed | Acts 16.1–5 | Whole in Christ, Living at Cultural Crossroads
excerpt: Many of us live between cultures. Finding identity at the crossroads of our unique design.

title: I'll Go This Way, and You Go That Way | Acts 15.36–41 | Learning to Disagree Without Tearing Apart
excerpt: Nobody likes conflict. Learning to navigate disagreement with maturity as God’s chosen people.
